description: Numbers of form 7^i*10^j, with i, j >= 0.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)a025632 n = a025632_list !! (n-1)a025632_list = f $ singleton (1,0,0) where   f s = y : f (insert (7 * y, i + 1, j) $ insert (10 * y, i, j + 1) s')         where ((y, i, j), s') = deleteFindMin s-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 15 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
